rooms.description: Wide entrance hall with Scandinavian design elements and neutral color palette, ensuring a welcoming atmosphere. Designed to incorporate Vastu principles by aligning the main entrance in an auspicious direction.

Spacious living room featuring open layout with large windows for natural light and scenic views, incorporating a home theater integrated into one wall. Scandinavian minimalism is evident through clean lines and functional furniture.

Modern, fully equipped kitchen designed in a farmhouse style with open shelves for displaying Scandinavian ceramics, ensuring efficient workflow while respecting Vastu by placing the stove in an auspicious corner.
Functional dining area adjacent to the kitchen, offering views of a large balcony that overlooks the garden. Scandinavian style with natural materials and a minimalist aesthetic is maintained.

Dedicated home office space designed for optimal work environment with ample natural light, ergonomic furniture and soundproofing. The roomâ€™s layout follows Vastu guidelines by aligning with the east direction.
Spacious balcony extending from the living area and bedrooms for relaxation, outdoor seating arrangement, and scenic views. The design uses Scandinavian simplicity with functional space usage.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east to harness positive energy as per Vastu principles, ensuring proper light and air circulation.
Large window with clear glass for natural lighting, placed strategically in accordance with Vastu guidelines to enhance energy flow.
Balcony access door that leads directly from the bedroom to the expansive balcony, designed to maximize ventilation and scenic views.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage, Scandinavian furniture, and a private balcony for relaxation. Vastu principles are applied by aligning the bed towards an auspicious direction.
Additional bedroom designed to provide comfort with ample space and its own balcony for privacy and fresh air, keeping Scandinavian simplicity in mind.
Modern bathroom integrated into the master bedroom suite featuring functional fixtures, Scandinavian design elements, and Vastu considerations to maintain a peaceful atmosphere.

Additional bedroom for children or guests, designed with functional space utilization, built-in storage solutions, and a private balcony to ensure fresh air. Scandinavian design is maintained with minimalism and natural light.
Third bedroom for extra comfort in a family of four, featuring space for personalization while adhering to Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Well-lit staircase connecting ground floor to the first floor, designed with safety features in mind while incorporating Scandinavian minimalist design elements.
Balcony access from bedrooms providing direct outdoor space for each bedroom as required by the design brief.
